New Records: Luke Kornet had a season-high 19 points on 6-of-6 shooting and seven free throws
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 29 points and went 14-of-17 from the free throw line
Payton Pritchard contributed 22 points off the bench
Minor scuffles between Grant Williams and Jayson Tatum and Derrick White
Post-Match Reflections: Celtics improved to 6-1 with the victory
Charlotte fell to 2-4 under Charles Lee
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball scored a game-high 37 points for the Hornets
